Buttons

A versatile components that creates a simple way to enhance your site. Switch buttons have set of styles to choose with and that depends on your site's themes.



Basic Setup

Use a class name ".button" and add it a tag name "<a>".

HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button">...</a>


Simple Buttons

Set of buttons for your needs. You can set different theme colors for your default, primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.


Button Link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important


HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button default">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button primary">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button secondary">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button tertiary">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button completed">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button error">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button important">...</a>


Button Full

A button with 100% width.

All the text inside the buttons are centered, but you can align the text using one of the utilities ".text-left", ".text-center"(default) and ".text-right"

Button Link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important

HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button full text-left">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button normal full">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button primary full text-right">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button secondary">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button tertiary full text-left">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button completed">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button error full text-right">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button important full">...</a>


Button Sizes

Sizes of buttons are categorized as "small", "medium", "large". The normal size is "default".

Button Small

Button Link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important

HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button default small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button primary small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button secondary small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button tertiary small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button completed small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button error small">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button important small">...</a>

Button w/ icon

For more pleasurable buttons, icons can be included.

Using Images

See Icons for reference.

Button Link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important

HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button"><i class="icon-image icon-image-home"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button default"><i class="icon-image icon-image-tag"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button primary"><i class="icon-image icon-image-cog-white"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button secondary"><i class="icon-image icon-image-instagram-white"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button tertiary"><i class="icon-image icon-image-envelope"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button completed"><i class="icon-image icon-image-check-white"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button error"><i class="icon-image icon-image-error-white"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button important"><i class="icon-image icon-image-error-white"></i>...</a>


Button with Font Awesome

We are strongly recommended FONT AWESOME (Created by Dave Gandy), if you want a clean and good looking icon fonts.

For more icons see font awesome website.

Button link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important

HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button"><i class="fa fa-home"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button default"><i class="fa fa-tag"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button primary"><i class="fa fa-cog"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button secondary"><i class="fa fa-instagram"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button tertiary"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button completed"><i class="fa fa-check"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button error"><i class="fa fa-times"></i>...</a>
<a href="#" class="button important"><i class="fa fa-times"></i>...</a>




Button with Arrow

A simple button together with arrows. It uses CSS to style triangular arrow.

Button Link Button Link

HTML example markup
<a href="#" class="button arrow">...</a>
<a href="#" class="button default arrow">...</a>


Button Category

Group of Buttons. Options in positioning, .left (default), .center, .right. Margins in between is adjustable.

Button category default

Button link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important


Button category center aligned

Button link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important


Button category right aligned

Button link Default Primary Secondary Tertiary Completed Error Important


HTML example markup
<div class="button-category center right">
	<a href="#" class="button">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button default">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button primary">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button secondary">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button tertiary">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button completed">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button error">...</a>
	<a href="#" class="button important">...</a>
</div>


SASS Configuration Variables

// Button paddings / marings styling
$button-padding-top-default: 7px !default;
$button-padding-bottom-default: 7px !default;
$button-padding-left-default: 15px !default;
$button-padding-right-default: 15px !default;

// Button paddings for Small buttons
$button-padding-top-small: 7px !default;
$button-padding-bottom-small: 7px !default;
$button-padding-left-small: 10px !default;
$button-padding-right-small: 10px !default;

// Button paddings for Medium buttons
$button-padding-top-medium: 7px !default;
$button-padding-bottom-medium: 7px !default;
$button-padding-left-medium: 12px !default;
$button-padding-right-medium: 12px !default;

// Button paddings for Large buttons
$button-padding-top-large: 9px !default;
$button-padding-bottom-large: 9px !default;
$button-padding-left-large: 20px !default;
$button-padding-right-large: 20px !default;

// Button margin bottom
$button-margin-bottom: 10px !default;

// Button border styling
$button-border: 1px solid transparent !default;
$button-border-radius: $border-radius-default !default;

// Button font / colors stlying
$button-font-family: $font-family-primary !default;
$button-color: $color-default !default;
$button-font-weight: normal !default;
$button-test-transoform: none !default;

// Button font sizes (default, small, medium, large)
$button-font-size-default: 14px !default;
$button-font-size-small: 11px !default;
$button-font-size-medium: 13px !default;
$button-font-size-large: 16px !default;

$button-min-width: auto !default;
$button-arrow-size: 30px !default;

// Shadow Inset
$button-shadow-inset-color: darken($color-primary, 10%) !default;
$button-shadow-inset-opacity: 1 !default;
$button-shadow-inset-category: 0 -3px 0px 0 !default; // h-shadow, v-shadow, blur, spread;

// Shadow Outset
$button-shadow-color: darken($color-primary, 10%) !default;
$button-shadow-opacity:0 !default; // Disable Outset Shadow, by giving 0 opacity;
$button-shadow-category: 0 0px 5px 0 !default; // h-shadow, v-shadow, blur, spread;

// Button Category
// margin for left aligned.
$button-category-margin-right: 0px !default;
//margin for center aligned.
$button-category-margin-center: 0px !default;
//margin for right aligned.
$button-category-margin-left: 0px !default;

// Button Default
$button-default-bg: $color-gray-lighten !default;
$button-default-color: $color-default !default;
$button-default-border-color: darken($color-gray-lighten, 15%) !default;

// Button Primary
$button-primary-bg: $color-primary !default;
$button-primary-color: $color-white !default;
$button-primary-border-color: $color-primary !default;

// Button Secondary
$button-secondary-bg: $color-secondary !default;
$button-secondary-color: $color-white !default;
$button-secondary-border-color: $color-secondary !default;

// Button Tertiary
$button-tertiary-bg: $color-tertiary !default;
$button-tertiary-color: $color-default !default;
$button-tertiary-border-color: $color-tertiary !default;

// Button Completed
$button-completed-bg: $color-completed !default;
$button-completed-color: $color-white !default;
$button-completed-border-color: $color-completed !default;

// Button Error
$button-error-bg: $color-error !default;
$button-error-color: $color-white !default;
$button-error-border-color: $color-error !default;

// Button Important
$button-important-bg: $color-important !default;
$button-important-color: $color-white !default;
$button-important-border-color: $color-important !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
